#include <iostream>
#include <map>		
#include <sstream>
#include <cstdlib>

#define int64 long long int

using namespace std;



int main()
{

	map<int,int>primes;
	primes[2] = 1, primes[3] = 1, primes[5] = 1, primes[7] = 1, primes[11] = 1, primes[13] = 1, primes[17] = 1, primes[19] = 1, primes[23] = 1, primes[31] = 1, primes[37]=1, primes[41] = 1, primes[43] = 1, primes[47] = 1;
	
	int T; cin >> T;
	
	while(T--)
	{
		int64 L = 0, U = 0; cin >> L >> U;
		
		int64 sum = 0, ctr = 0;
			
		for(int64 i = L; i <= U; i++)
		{
		
			stringstream out;
			out << i;
			string pr = out.str();
			
			sum = 0;
		
			for(int p = 0; p < pr.length(); p++)
			{
				sum += (pr[p]-48);
			}
			
			if(primes[sum] == 1)
				ctr++;
			
		}// end for
		
		printf("%ld\n",ctr);
		
	}//end  while
	
	return 0;
}
